question: Which of the following is correct with regarding to Keynesian theory?
option2: The theory was first published in The wealth of nations
option3: Deficit spending is antidote to recession
answer: Deficit spending is antidote to recession
explanation: Keynes was one of the most celebrated economist of all times. He published the General theory of employment, Interest and Money and this became the basis of Macroeconomic theories. Â Under Keynesianism, deficit spending was the antidote to recession. His ideas informed governments\' response to the great depression, and played a pivotal role in the creation of a new monetary standard at the close of World War II. To this day, many of Keynes\' most radical ideas are still economic orthodoxy.
